name: Seaside Campground
description: A beautiful campground located by the sea, ideal for beach lovers.

name: Mountain View Campsite
description: A peaceful campsite with stunning views of the surrounding mountains.

name: Forest Escape
description: Nestled in the forest, this campsite offers a perfect retreat for nature lovers.

name: Lakefront Retreat
description: A serene lakeside campground offering various water activities.

name: Desert Oasis Camp
description: A desert-themed campsite that provides an escape from the city with amazing views.

description: A riverside campsite perfect for kayaking and outdoor adventures.

name: Highland Campsite
description: A highland campsite offering cooler temperatures and beautiful alpine views.

name: Adventure Base Camp
description: A campground for adrenaline junkies, with rock climbing and mountain biking activities.

description: A coastal camping spot where you can enjoy beach activities and explore marine life.

name: Wilderness Haven
description: A remote wilderness campsite that offers a peaceful and isolated environment.

description: A green campsite focused on sustainable practices and eco-friendly activities.

description: A campsite perfect for stargazing and astrophotography.

description: A winter wonderland campsite offering skiing and snowboarding activities.

name: Beachside Camping
description: A beachside campsite with stunning sunsets and various water sports.
